items.name: DataOptimizer
items.content: # =================================================================== # # Script: DataOptimizer # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class DataOptimizer ###* * The data optimizer is to optimize data structures coming from data files to * make processing faster. One way of optimization for example is to convert * regular array to typed arrays. * * @module gs * @class DataOptimizer * @memberof gs * @static * @constructor ### constructor: -> @labels = {} @labelJumps = {} ###* * Converts the specified number-array to a typed Int16 array. * * @method arrayToNativeArray * @param {Array} array - The array to convert. * @return {Int16Array} The typed array. * @static ### arrayToNativeArray: (array) -> result = null length = array.length || Object.keys(array).length if array? if window.ArrayBuffer? result = new ArrayBuffer(length * 2) result = new Int16Array(result) else result = new Array(length) for i in [0...length] result[i] = array[i] return result ###* * Creates a typed Int16 array if supported. Otherwise a regular array is created. * * @method nativeArray16 * @param {number} size - The size of the array in elements.(Not in bytes). * @return {Int16Array} The Int16 array. * @static ### nativeArray16: (size) -> #result = new ArrayBuffer(size * 2) #result = new Int16Array(result) result = new Array(size) return result ###* * Creates a typed Int8 array if supported. Otherwise a regular array is created. * * @method nativeArray16 * @param {number} size - The size of the array in elements.(Not in bytes). * @return {Int8Array} The Int8 array. * @static ### nativeArray8: (size) -> result = new Array(size) return result ###* * Removes a single empty command like a comment. * * @method removeEmptyCommand * @private * @param {Object[]} commands - A list of commands. * @param {Object} command - The command to optimize. * @static ### removeEmptyCommand: (command, index, commands) -> return no if GameManager.inLivePreview result = no switch commands[index].id when "gs.Comment" commands.splice(index, 1) result = yes when "gs.EmptyCommand" commands.splice(index, 1) result = yes return result ###* * Checks if a common event call can be optimized by inline it. In special cases, * such as recursion or parameters, an optimization is no possible. * * @method optimizeCommonEventCall * @private * @param {Object[]} commands - A list of commands. * @param {number} index - Index of the command in command-list. * @param {Object} command - The command to optimize. * @return If true the call can be safly inline. Otherwise false * @static ### canInlineCommonEventCall: (command, index, commands, callStack) -> result = !(command.params.commonEventId.index?) commonEvent = RecordManager.commonEvents[command.params.commonEventId] if commonEvent?.inline if callStack.indexOf(commonEvent) != -1 result = no else callStack.push(commonEvent) for c, i in commonEvent.commands if c.id == "gs.CallCommonEvent" result = @canInlineCommonEventCall(c, i, commonEvent.commands, callStack) return result ###* * Optimizes a common event call. * * @method optimizeCommonEventCall * @private * @param {Object[]} commands - A list of commands. * @param {number} index - Index of the command in command-list. * @param {Object} command - The command to optimize. * @static ### optimizeCommonEventCall: (command, index, commands) -> commonEvent = RecordManager.commonEvents[command.params.commonEventId] if commonEvent?.inline if @canInlineCommonEventCall(command, index, commands, []) commands.splice(index, 1) commands.splice.apply(commands, [index, 0].concat(Object.copy(commonEvent.commands))) ###* * Optimizes the variable-access by replacing the domain-string with the domain-index * value at runtime to allow faster domain access using integer numbers instead of strings. * * @method optimizeVariableAccess * @param {Object} data - The data to opimize, e.g. the params-object of a command. * @static ### optimizeVariableAccess: (data) -> return if data?.__optimized data?.__optimized = yes for p of data if data[p] instanceof Array and !data[p].__optimized data[p].__optimized = yes for e in data[p] @optimizeVariableAccess(e) else if p == "domain" and data.scope > 0 and data.index? domainIndex = GameManager.variableStore.domains.indexOf(data[p]) data[p] = if domainIndex == -1 then data[p] else domainIndex else if typeof data[p] == "object" and !(data[p] instanceof String || data[p] instanceof Array) @optimizeVariableAccess(data[p]) if not data[p]?.__optimized data[p]?.__optimized = yes ###* * Optimizes a single command. * * @method optimizeCommand * @private * @param {Object[]} commands - A list of commands. * @param {number} index - Index of the command in command-list. * @param {Object} command - The command to optimize. * @static ### optimizeCommand: (command, index, commands) -> @optimizeVariableAccess(command.params) switch command.id when "gs.CallCommonEvent" @optimizeCommonEventCall(command, index, commands) when "gs.Label" @labels[command.params.name] = index @labelJumps[command.params.name]?.forEach (c) -> c.params.labelIndex = index when "vn.Choice" command.params.action.labelIndex = @labels[command.params.action.label] if !@labelJumps[command.params.action.label] @labelJumps[command.params.action.label] = [] @labelJumps[command.params.action.label].push(command) when "gs.CheckSwitch", "gs.CheckNumberVariable", "gs.CheckTextVariable" command.params.labelIndex = @labels[command.params.label] if !@labelJumps[command.params.label] @labelJumps[command.params.label] = [] @labelJumps[command.params.label].push(command) #when "gs.AddHotspot" # command.params.actions.onClick when "gs.JumpToLabel" command.params.labelIndex = @labels[command.params.name] if !@labelJumps[command.params.name] @labelJumps[command.params.name] = [] @labelJumps[command.params.name].push(command) ###* * Optimizes a list of event/scene commands by removing unnecessary commands like * comments or empty commands. It also optimizes label jumps. Adds an optimized to * the specified command-list to indicate that the list was already optimized. If optimized * property of command-list is set to true this method will return immediately. * * @method optimizeEventCommands * @param {Object[]} commands - A list of commands to optimize. * @static ### optimizeEventCommands: (commands) -> return if commands.optimized i = 0 @labels = {} @labelJumps = {} if !$PARAMS.preview while i < commands.length commands[i].indent = commands[i].indent || 0 if @removeEmptyCommand(commands[i], i, commands) i-- i++ i = 0 while i < commands.length @optimizeCommand(commands[i], i, commands) i++ commands.optimized = yes window.DataOptimizer = new DataOptimizer() gs.DataOptimizer = DataOptimizer
